Wichita.Earhart Environmental Magnet Elementary:
Earhart Environmental Magnet Elementary School is a public elementary school in Wichita, Kansas named after native Kansas aviator Amelia Earhart. A magnet school situated on an 10-acre (40,000 m2) site, it augments the District curriculum with an environmental focus.


== Environmental education ==
Although the school has a standard curriculum, a lot of resources at the school are aimed at improving environmental awareness through the addition of numerous 'environmental' courses.
